StreamNotificationCommands(DbService, InteractiveService)

Contains commands for managing stream notifications within a Discord guild.

InteractiveService serv

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

StreamAdd(string)

Adds a new stream to the notification list for the current guild.

Declaration
[Cmd("StreamAdd")]
[Aliases("StreamAdd")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageMessages)]
public Task StreamAdd(string link)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string link

The link to the stream to be added.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This command allows users with the "Manage Messages" permission to add a stream link to the guild's notification list. When the stream goes live, the guild will be notified. This feature supports various streaming platforms.

| Edit this page View Source

StreamCheck(string)

Checks the live status of a stream by its URL.

Declaration
[Cmd("StreamCheck")]
[Aliases("StreamCheck")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task StreamCheck(string url)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string url

The URL of the stream to check.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This command is useful for manually checking the live status of a stream. It provides immediate feedback on whether the stream is currently live and, if so, the number of viewers.

| Edit this page View Source

StreamList()

Lists all streams currently followed by the guild.

Declaration
[Cmd("StreamList")]
[Aliases("StreamList")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
public Task StreamList()
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

Provides a paginated list of all streams the guild is following for notifications. This list includes each stream's username, type, and the channel where notifications are sent.

| Edit this page View Source

StreamMessage(int, string)

Sets a custom notification message for a specific stream in the guild's notification list.

Declaration
[Cmd("StreamMessage")]
[Aliases("StreamMessage")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageMessages)]
public Task StreamMessage(int index, string message)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int index

The 1-based index of the stream to set the message for.
string message

The custom message to be sent when the stream goes live. An empty message will reset it to default.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This command allows customization of the notification message for specific streams. It is useful for adding personalized or additional information to stream notifications.

| Edit this page View Source

StreamOffline()

Toggles the setting for notifying the guild when a followed stream goes offline.

Declaration
[Cmd("StreamOffline")]
[Aliases("StreamOffline")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageMessages)]
public Task StreamOffline()
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

Users with the "Manage Messages" permission can toggle notifications for when any of the followed streams go offline. This setting is helpful for guilds that wish to track stream status closely.

| Edit this page View Source

StreamRemove(int)

Removes a stream from the notification list based on its index.

Declaration
[Cmd("StreamRemove")]
[Aliases("StreamRemove")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.ManageMessages)]
[Priority(1)]
public Task StreamRemove(int index)
Parameters
Type Name Description
int index

The 1-based index of the stream in the notification list to be removed.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

Users with the "Manage Messages" permission can remove streams from the guild's notification list. This command requires specifying the index of the stream, which can be obtained through the stream list command.

| Edit this page View Source

StreamsClear()

Clears all streams from the guild's notification list.

Declaration
[Cmd("StreamsClear")]
[Aliases("StreamsClear")]
[RequireContext(ContextType.Guild)]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
public Task StreamsClear()
Returns
Type Description
Task
Remarks

This command allows administrators to remove all stream links from the guild's notification list. It is intended for use in situations where a complete reset of stream notifications is necessary.

Discord.Commands.IModuleBase
